citations.narrative:
Records are not available. Correct and accurate records are necessary, providing guidance for animal production and
welfare. Licensee shall make, keep, and maintain records which fully and correctly disclose the required information
including guinea pigs in their possession and those those born, transported, sold, euthanized, died, or otherwise disposed
of by licensee.
Correct by: November 1, 2021

A few of the lower Guinea pig pens remain wet and/or heavily soiled. Effected enclosures are too dirty, the guinea pigs
are unable to rest in a clean, dry area. A dirty enclosure contributes to animal stress and disease. Primary enclosures
shall be cleaned and sanitized often enough to prevent an accumulation of excreta and debris. A program must be
developed and maintained which provides effective cleaning and sanitation.
Remains uncorrected
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Licensee.
End Section

narrative:
2.75(b)(1) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
Records are not available.  Correct and accurate records are necessary, providing guidance for animal production and 
welfare.   Licensee shall make, keep, and maintain records which fully and correctly disclose the required information 
including guinea pigs in their possession and those those born, transported, sold, euthanized, died, or otherwise disposed 
of by licensee. 
 
Correct by:  November 1, 2021 
3.31(a)(1)  Repeat
   
Sanitation. 
A few of the lower Guinea pig pens remain wet and/or heavily soiled.  Effected enclosures are too dirty, the guinea pigs 
are unable to rest in a clean, dry area.  A dirty enclosure contributes to animal stress and disease.  Primary enclosures 
shall be cleaned and sanitized often enough to prevent an accumulation of excreta and debris.  A program must be 
developed and maintained which provides effective cleaning and sanitation. 
 
Remains uncorrected

This inspection and exit interview were conducted with  Licensee. 
 
End Section
